snippet.title: Roniu's Tale - New NES Original- Pledge Now On Kickstarter
snippet.description:
Roniu's Tale is a brand new puzzle-action NES original by Kunjee Studios. Join as Roniu discovers that even though there's no turning back, the power within can help him escape anything.

Features:
43 Levels of Dangerous Pathways
Head Scratching Puzzles
A Whirlwind of Enemies and Epic Bosses

Check Roniu's Tale on Kickstarter for more information on the EXCLUSIVE BACKER REWARDS:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/megacatstudios/ronius-tale-for-the-nes

Visit our page to get notified when the Roniu's Tale Kickstarter launches: https://megacatstudios.com/pages/roniu-s-tale

Follow Kunjee Studios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kunjeestudio/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kunjeestudio?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kunjee_studio/?hl=en

Stay Up to Date with Mega Cat Studios:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/megacastudios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/megacatstudios?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/megacatstudios/?hl=en

Claymation by Dony_Creations
